title: Cuba Gooding Jr. stars in musical "Chicago"
text:
Cuba Gooding Jr. stars in musical "Chicago" Wednesday, March 21, 2018 - 01:54 
Academy award-winning actor Cuba Gooding Jr. is starring in the London revival of musical ''Chicago'' taking on the role of lawyer Billy Flynn. ROUGH CUT (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
